ygData.subject: RE: Plane of fear (Was Re: Bard Revenge)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Am I the only one who fires up Sonorous Clouding before zoning?  If it s a hot LZ, those 10 seconds of invisibility could save your life.  Dunno if
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 29 Jul 1999, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
>
> > Pretty much its a one way trip into your worst nightmare. Have you
> > explored in there at all? On Cazic-Thule, we were killing everything
> > including the dracoliche, then they upgraded it. That is pretty much
> > the end of the story, we all got slaughtered right as we came in and
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
> > took hours to get our corpses out. "People die hard in the plane of
> > fear" really took its meaning.
>
> I heard this today, that last night some of my friends lost a level or two.
> EEK. glad i stayed out after my first two deaths, and that was before the
> upgrade, and before i went up with a sizable group.

Am I the only one who fires up Sonorous Clouding before
zoning? If it's a hot LZ, those 10 seconds of invisibility
could save your life. Dunno if invisibility even works on the
plane of fear, but it's good advice for all the other zones.
Usually I do Accelerando, Clouding, then zone, so not only am
I invisible when I pop through, I have about 5 seconds of
speed as well.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
